name: Ice Wind's Refrain
text:
Activate 1 of these effects.
? Target 1 "Windwitch" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position.
? When your opponent activates a card or effect in response to the activation of your "Windwitch" monster's effect: You can negate that opponent's effect.
You can only activate 1 "Ice Wind's Refrain" per turn.
